message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality item that will meet your needs. I'm willing to offer it to you for $16,000. What are your thoughts?
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. This product is a bit outside my budget right now. I'd be willing to pay $10,000 for it. Let me know what you think.

Hi Bob, I understand that $10,000 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $13,000. This is my best price for now, but I'm open to negotiating further if you're willing to meet me at this price.
Hi Alice, I appreciate you working with me on the price.  Would you be willing to come down to $11,500?  I think that's a fair price.

Hi Bob, I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $11,500, but I'm still a bit short of my target. I can offer it to you for $14,000. This is a compromise that I'm willing to make to move the deal forward, but I'm not willing to go any lower.
